detalii.detalii1: Obverse: is represented by the equestrian of Prince Mihai Viteazul, the inscription in a circular arc 'ROMANIA', the nominal number '10 LEI', the coat of arms of Romania and the year of issue '2018'.
detalii.detalii2: Reverse: in the central part, the face of Mihai Viteazul as it is presented on the obverse of the 10 ducati Mihai Viteazul coin, in the lower part, the reproduction of the reverse of the coin, and the inscription 'ISTORIA AURULUI – MONEDA DE 10 DUCATI MIHAI VITEAZUL' as a arc of circle.

detalii.detalii1: Obverse: the representation of the obverse of the 50lei gold coin with the year 1922, the inscription 'ROMANIA', the nominal value '10 LEI', the year of issue '2019'and the coat of arms of Romania.
detalii.detalii2: Reverse: the representation of the reverse of the 50lei gold coin with the year 1922 and the inscription 'ISTORIA AURULUI MONEDA DE 50 LEI 1922' in two rows.

detalii.detalii1: Obverse: the golden crown of Queen Elisabeta of Romania, the inscription in a circular arc 'ROMANIA', the year of issue '2017', the coat of arms of Romania and the nominal value '10 LEI'.
detalii.detalii2: Reverse: the portrait of Queen Elisabeta of Romania and the inscription in a circular arc 'REGINA ELISABETA A ROMANIEI'.

detalii.detalii1: Obverse: In the central part a circular medallion, inside which is reproduced the coat of arms of Romania, surrounded by a decorative element. Around the medallion is engraved circularly, at the top, the inscription 'ROMANIA', and at the bottom, the face value '500 LEI'. The year of issue '2001' is inscribed horizontally on either side of the circular medallion.
detalii.detalii2: Reverse: In the center part, the graphic representation of a piece from the Pietroasa Treasure, namely the large fibula (cloşca) as well as the inscription 'TEZAURUL DE LA PIETROASA'.
